page.title: 04EDUCATION IN DENBIGH
page.content: Ten schools are situated within the block providing nursery,infant,primary secondary,Welsh medium,private and special education.The{E.S.N.}school is closing to make way for the resiting of{Frongoch Primary School,}its pupils being intergrated into existing "mainstream" schools. The{High School}is under-going major re-modelling since it has become situated on a single site.First priority has been given to the school building work although there is public concern over the delay in starting the {sports centre}project which has been delayed due to a Welsh Office spending moratorium.The present gymnasium was built more than 25 yrs. ago when the school had 300 pupils.It has now become inadequate for a school of{1000 {pupils}and a town with an approximate population of{9000. }
